game.name: Battle For Kingdom
game.description:
This war is different from the ones you witnessed before. Hope you have practiced your fighting skills perfectly before entering this battlefield where enemies keep coming in different waves. Is not quite exciting to be a part of the battle where you have to take care of the entire kingdom? The king of the kingdom is impressed with your bravery work and has assigned you a job of protecting his kingdom along with her princess. Join Battle For Kingdom and get ready to protect your kingdom against the deadly monsters!

Do not bother, friends! You are not alone in this adventurous journey as tons of different soldiers are available in your army. Grab your weapons and get ready to lead your units to the most awaited victory in this one of the best adventure games! This battle is going to be the most epic as you have to fight against a horde of radioactive burgers, toxic monsters, muddy demons and different kinds of other unique creatures. Your focus and war strategy will help you to get through all hurdles and defeat your enemies fast. 

It is not a matter of clearing only one level in this html5 war game. You have to keep focused until you clear all 40 levels with your logical mind. Prepare a strategy before entering the battlefield and attack on your all your enemies before they enter your area! Keep grabbing coins to purchase new characters and upgrade your weapons to add more fun and excitement to the gameplay! We on atmegame.com are happy to offer more free adventure games for kids, no download required.
game.metaTitle: Battle For Kingdom,  Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Battle For Kingdom at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP TO CHOOSE THE DEFENDERS BY TAPPING ON 50/100 AND COLLECT THE DIMONDS TO RELOAD THE DEFENDERS
game.webControlKeys: LEFT CLICK TO CHOOSE THE DEFENDERS BY CLICK ON 50/100 AND COLLECT THE DIMONDS TO RELOAD THE DEFENDERS
